data.feedback: Epic architecture is sound. All filesToModify exist (pubspec.yaml, main.dart, analysis_options.yaml), all filesToCreate are new (verified via Glob). Backend contracts (ApiResponse, User, Step, Goal, Sharing models) exactly match TypeScript definitions. Validators align with backend rules. Clean architecture pattern is appropriate for Flutter.
suggestions: Story 3 developers should use dependency injection (constructor or service locator) for SecureStorageService to avoid compile-time dependency on Story 4
